scripts.build: rimraf ./dist/* && npx webpack && cpy ./publicSrc/**/* ./dist/all && ncp ./dist/all ./dist/chrome && move-cli ./dist/all ./dist/firefox && rimraf ./dist/chrome/manifest_firefox.json && rimraf ./dist/firefox/manifest_chrome.json && move-cli ./dist/chrome/manifest_chrome.json ./dist/chrome/manifest.json && move-cli ./dist/firefox/manifest_firefox.json ./dist/firefox/manifest.json
